paramInformation.label: Basic Set OFF Level
paramInformation.description: Control the value represented by the left-side in area D.

paramInformation.label: Basic Set ON Level
paramInformation.description: Control the value represented by the right-side in area D.

paramInformation.label: Auto Report Battery Time
paramInformation.description: The interval time for auto reporting the Battery level.

paramInformation.label: Customer Function
paramInformation.description: Bit 0: Dimmer setting method. Bit 1: Disable buzzer in timer mode.

paramInformation.label: Scene Holding Report
paramInformation.description: Send Central Scene Holding when the button is held.
